#include<stdio.h>
//#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    int t,m,n,k,i,j,arr[1000][1000];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d %d %d",&m,&n,&k);
              //int arr[m][n];
              //memset(arr,0,sizeof(arr));
              i=0;
              while(i<=m)
              {
              j=0;
              while(j<=n)
              {
                              if(i==0||j==0)
                              arr[i][j]=1;
                              else
                              arr[i][j]=(arr[i-1][j]+arr[i][j-1])%k;
                              j++;
              }
              i++;
              }
              printf("%d\n",arr[m][n]);
    }  
    
    
}
